programme.title: BBC News

programme.desc: Conversation, advice and great company to make your morning.

programme.desc: Coded information in a spreadsheet reveals the perpetrator of a campaign of blackmail.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Ardingly in West Sussex is the location for today's programme. Christina Trevanion is in charge, with experts Nick Hall and Ochuko Ojiri helping the red and blue teams as they each spend £300. Christina also looks at the history of East Grinstead pottery.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest national and international news from the BBC.

programme.title: Rip Off Britain S14
programme.desc: Rip Off Britain continues its run with Julia Somerville, Gloria Hunniford and Angela Rippon hearing from the families pushed to the brink by mould in their homes and who feel their complaints aren't being heard. And the young widow being forced to make tough choices, all because her late husband's life insurance policy hasn't paid out seven months after he died. Plus there are plenty more tips and advice from the Virtual Advice Clinic.

programme.title: Virtually Home S1 (7/15)
programme.desc: Karen Livingstone Welstead brings some style and character to a bedroom in Newcastle.

programme.title: Escape to the Country S23 (40/55)
programme.desc: Briony May Williams shows today's buyer some wonderful properties in Devon and Dorset.

programme.title: The Bidding Room S4 (16/30)
programme.desc: Five dealers bid to buy a ride-on train and a rugby shirt from a famous film.

programme.title: Unbeatable S2
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the quiz show where players try to find the unbeatable answer.

programme.title: Pointless S29
programme.desc: The brainy quiz returns, but this time host Alexander Armstrong is joined by co-host Ed Gamble. As always, contestants try to score as few points as possible by plumbing the depths of their general knowledge to come up with the answers no-one else could think of.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest national and international news from the BBC.

programme.title: BBC London News
programme.desc: A news program focusing on all the latest breaking and developing news stories as they happen in London, as well as the business, travel, weather and sport news. BBC London News usually follows the BBC News at One, Six and Ten programmes and also features during BBC Breakfast in the morning for regular news and travel updates for commuter in the capital. The show is filmed in London at the BBC Broadcasting House on Portland. The programme often features stories that have been appearing on social media too.

programme.title: Party Election Broadcast
programme.desc: A party election broadcast by the Green Party for the local elections in May.

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Alex Jones and Emma Willis bring you the stories that matter from across the country.

programme.title: EastEnders (n°6678)
programme.desc: Lily's gender reveal party doesn't go to plan. Eve plays a dangerous game with Nish.

programme.title: Mission déco S4 (6/8)
programme.desc: The quarter-final challenge involves wedding accommodation on the banks of Rutland Water.

programme.title: MasterChef S19
programme.desc: This week's seven remaining home cooks return to test their culinary wits and show judges John Torode and Gregg Wallace that they have the potential to be MasterChef Champion 2023. Their next challenge is the most difficult so far - cooking a dish to a brief set by one of the country's toughest food critics, William Sitwell. William wants them to prepare a dish inspired by their favourite celebrity chef. Then, one more challenge remains in which to earn a place in this week's quarter-final. With just four places up for grabs, the contenders must each cook a dish with layers. Who will handle the pressure and show they have what it takes to progress further in the competition?

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest national and international news, with reports from BBC correspondents worldwide.

programme.title: Rain Dogs (Scenes from a Crucifixion) S1 (n°2)

programme.title: Gossip Girl *2021 (Deb Brawl in a Blue Dress) S2 (1/10)
